channel.title: For my bday
channel.description:
Hey for my bday anybody wanna play zombies with me? either on the playstation or the nintendo ds. I dont really mind which one just wanna play lol
EDIT** COD BLACK OPS

item.title: For my bday
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:12, topic:397352”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=494499.msg3615975#msg3615975 date=1306971148]

I hit turn on, my ps3 turns yellow, blinks 3 times, then goes blinking red till I hit it again, where it goes pure red again. How do I fix?

Sounds like a brick, not sure though. I just know the psp stays black screened and power goes off after like 5 seconds. I brick my psp like monthly so I can have the pleasure of fixing it.

ps3, not psp. I already bricked a psp once.
[/quote]
They can still be bricked though, all I was saying?[/quote]
When my psp was bricked, it had no response whatsoever. However, the light bleeps on this, so I think there is still a chance.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“GML Programmer, post:4, topic:397352”][quote author=Generation317or562 link=topic=494499.msg3615292#msg3615292 date=1306906078]
I will in about hm, a week or so? Ps3 is currently being repaired, watch out for the green light of death. That’s right I said green… Yeah, in week I will play zombies with you. Are you pumped for MW3!!!
[/quote]I cant wait! I already pre ordered it lol[/quote]

!!! I’m jealous! It got banned in the UK, can you believe that??? What next America…(Packing my bags, going to Canada.)
